mdx.excerpt: iOS UICollectionView: The Complete Guide  will teach you everything you need to know to take your iOS app from good to great! I show you how to use Apple's new user interface,  UICollectionView , to efficiently display content in iOS applications. iOS developers of all levels will learn how to create intuitive…
